activities: Agent who Processes Personal Information on Behalf of its Customers – Force 5 Media, Inc. (“Force 5 Media”) provides marketing, promotional and media services. In this capacity, Force 5 Media does not own or control any of the information it processes on behalf of its customers. All such information is owned and controlled by Force 5 Media’s customers. In this capacity, Force 5 Media receives information transferred from the European Union to the United States merely as an agent who processes personal information on behalf of its Customers. Force 5 Media may use the services of third party agents to process personal information in accordance with purposes identified for such personal information by the applicable client.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: Council of Better Business Bureaus, Inc.’s BBB EU Safe Harbor program
recoursemech: Council of Better Business Bureaus, Inc.’s BBB Safe Harbor Privacy Dispute Resolution Procedure.
